name: Lost in the Frost
description:
Lost in the Frost is a platforming shooter set in a drab 2-color word. by StormFath3r (Mountainside Games)

It was created for Mini Jam 42 and was completed in 72 hours from November 29th 2019 to December 1st 2019. MiniJam 42 had a theme of "Snow" and a limitation of 2 colors(no shading). All assets were created by me with the exception of the SFX. Lost in the Frost was built in Unity with the Corgi Engine extension.

I hope you enjoy this quick 72 hour prototype!
